abstract: Xstrata, the world’s fourth-largest copper producer, rose to a three-week high in London trading after newspaper reports that Companhia Vale do Rio Doce may agree to buy the company within the next few days.
lead_paragraph: Xstrata, the world’s fourth-largest copper producer, rose to a three-week high in London trading after newspaper reports that Companhia Vale do Rio Doce may agree to buy the company within the next few days.

headline.main: Xstrata Close to Vale Bid, Report Says
